searchList.name: Quartz: School
searchList.description: Quartz module to change color after the spell school on cast bars.

searchList.name: Quartz: Procs Module

searchList.name: Quartz: Power Bar
searchList.description: Module for Quartz to show Secondary Powers like Demonic Fury
